entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: Looks like a hermit lives in the mountains near Doaba Guerfel. He seemed to lack social graces, but he let you poke around.
entries.journal_entry_description: Learn as much as you can about the structure near where the hiking party disappeared.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: A nearby house is the closest building to the site of the disappearances. Find out if the owner knows anything.
entries.task01_comm_message_text: He seems compliant, but I've known many criminals that are. He gave you permission to search the place. Look around for oddities. There may be some kind of personal possession from the missing hikers.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Commander Talte sent you a message: He seems compliant, but I've known many criminals that are. He gave you permission to search the place. Look around for oddities. There may be some kind of personal possession from the missing hikers.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Look around the house for clues. Some of the objects may not belong.
entries.task07_comm_message_text: I'll show these images to Angela and see if she recognizes anything. Talk to the man again and keep him busy until I get back to you.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: I'll show images of the objects to Angela and see if she recognizes anything. Talk to the old man again and keep him busy. I want to make sure that he doesn't get spooked and run.
